Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli

Class UICache

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli.UICache
public class UICache
extends java.lang.Object
This class reproduce locally the basic features of the server in order to maintain a consistent state of the game between server and client. It handles the players, the workers and the board.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String username, int number, UIColor color)
      Add a player to the match.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player
      number - unique id of the player
      color - unique (not necessarily) color of the player

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String username)
      Remove a player from the match. This will effectively wipe the player and all of it's workers from the game.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to remove

    • getPlayers

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(UIWorker worker, java.lang.String player, UICell cell)
      Updates the cache by setting a worker to a cell
      Parameters:
      worker - to be set
      player - owner of the worker
      cell - where the worker should be set to

    • unsetWorker

      public void unsetWorker​(UIWorker worker)
      Remove a worker from the Board
      Parameters:
      worker - to be removed from the board
